dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3125 IH: Ambassador Ebenezer D. Bassett Commemorative Stamp Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. DeLauro introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Ebenezer D. Bassett, the first African-American diplomat.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ambassador Ebenezer D. Bassett Commemorative Stamp Act.

section.header: Ebenezer D. Bassett commemorative postage stamp

subsection.text: The Postmaster General shall issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Ebenezer D. Bassett.

paragraph.text: be issued in the denomination used for first class mail up to one ounce in weight;
bear such designs as the Postmaster General shall determine; and
be placed on sale as soon as practicable after the date of the enactment of this section and shall be sold for such period thereafter as the Postmaster General shall determine.
